channel.title: Connecting to a client problem
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I recently put on my server and gave the source to the other owner. Everyone else can connect to the server except for me, no matter who is hosting it. I need some help on why I can't connect? Ty.
Edit: I also get this error when I try to run my client using the files not the jar file: [code] java.net.UnknownHostException: armascape.no-ip.org at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2663) Press any key to continue . . . [/code] Any ideas?

item.title: Connecting to a client problem
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

Hey guys,

I recently put on my server and gave the source to the other owner. Everyone else can connect to the server except for me, no matter who is hosting it. I need some help on why I canâ€™t connect?
Ty.

Edit: I also get this error when I try to run my client using the files not the jar file:

java.net.UnknownHostException: armascape.no-ip.org
        at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
        at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)
        at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18)
        at client.main(client.java:2663)
Press any key to continue . . .

Any ideas?

Read full topic
